mapper.insert: insert into bas_customer_agent_balance( customer_id, agent_id, agent_name, agent_balance ) values ( #{customerId}, #{agentId}, #{agentName}, #{agentBalance} )
mapper.update: update bas_customer_agent_balance set agent_balance = agent_balance - #{agentBalance}, type = #{type} where customer_id = #{customerId} and agent_balance - #{agentBalance} = 0

choose.when: update bas_customer_agent_balance set agent_balance = agent_balance + #{agentBalance} where customer_id = #{customerId}
choose.otherwise: update bas_customer_agent_balance set agent_balance = agent_balance + #{agentBalance} where customer_id = #{customerId} and agent_balance + #{agentBalance} >= 0
